forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 64F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
